name: AR Spaceship Shooting Rider
description:
AR Spaceship Shooting Game, be the commander of an elite warrior platoon and find yourself in the midst of large-scale war events.

Launch the game and look around with your camera to find the AR alien spaceships approaching you. Get ready to kill all the alien spaceships and save the humanity from total annihilation!

Look down at the radar to know the exact location of the approaching spaceships. Use your AR controls to blast them away. The enemies will arrive in waves to test the strength of your war skills. Do not back down and emerge victorious.
Plenty of boosters, including grenades, nanobots, implants, armor and medical kits with smooth controls, impressive graphics.

The perfect mix of gaming and augmented reality makes Shooting AR the first of its kind! Detailed games changing upgrades available to help you make the nest of each level. Defeat small spaceships till you encounter the boss, then annihilate him to be the master of Shooting AR. Change the definition of shooting games with augmented reality! Try this fresh new game today!
